news_header: Debate on new nuclear power plant could cost state billions; funding models need further examination.
news_original_title: Uusi ydinvoimala voisi tarvita miljardien takuita valtiolta
news_text: The Energy Company Fortum has initiated a debate on constructing a new nuclear power plant, which could lead to billions in state liabilities. Officials indicate that various funding models may represent significant financial responsibilities. Preliminary reports highlight concerns about funding, necessitating more information for proper assessment. Juha Majanen from the Ministry of Finance emphasizes the need to further analyze the costs and impacts on the electricity market, as the energy sector is cautious about the proposed new model for the nuclear plant.
